title: PV array
fullText:
assembly of electrically interconnected PV modules, PV strings or PV sub-arrays comprising all components up to the d.c. input terminals of the inverter or other power conversion equipment or d.c. loads
Note 1 to entry: A PV array may consist of a single PV module, a single PV string, or several parallel-connected strings, or several parallel-connected PV sub-arrays and their associated electrical components (see Figures 2.2 to 2.8).
Note 2 to entry: Does not include the PV array foundation, tracking apparatus, thermal control, and other such components.
